thread.title: Get business ready with The Dylan Amsterdam
thread.title_full: Get business ready with The Dylan Amsterdam

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Get business ready with The Dylan Amsterdam
text:
Get business ready with The Dylan Amsterdam Get business ready with The Dylan Amsterdam Details Category: Hotel   16:30 As Autumn approaches, Amsterdam is once again gearing up to host a number of conventions over September and October. For years it has become the epicentre for global business and this year is no different as the city transforms itself into a hub of networking, entertaining and opportunity. To welcome the business masses, The Dylan Amsterdam has a superb package to help any business traveller visiting the city to get ‘meeting ready’. 
The Dylan Amsterdam’s Business Package stays true its reputation for unparalleled personal service, created with time-strapped execs in mind to make visits as smooth and successful as possible. The package ensures business guests are ready and refreshed for their long day ahead by offering services such as shoe polishing, shirt pressing, network drinks and more. The Dylan Amsterdam’s Business package starts from £280 per person per package excluding 5.5% city tax and including: • Overnight stay in a double room • Express check-in • Complimentary ‘Networking’ drink in Bar Barbou • Dylan Buffet Breakfast • Complimentary use of Josephine’s meeting room upon availability between 7am-10am • Complimentary shirt pressing • Complimentary newspaper of guest’s choice • Complimentary overnight shoe polish service • Express check-out • Bottle of water and coffee to go on checking-out • Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel • Computer (with printer service) available on a complimentary basis Package is subject to availability and valid from 23rd August until 23rd December 2015.
